title: Gd, a girl just asked me a highly loaded question. Tell me what to say. (serious)
body:
Talking to girl about how she has a nice bod.

Girl says how she doesn't (common among pretty much every woman today)

I explain how she does (explanation)

Girl says "yeah kinda. but i got bigger hips and thighs"

I explain how that is linked to fertility and valued in MOST cultures( truth)

Girl continues to argue, points out "don't you like chubby girls?" cause i dated her distant friend who was chubby (not FAT but chubby)



What is the correct answer to "don't you like chubby girls?" to get her to open up to me more and feel better about herself/ wanna get with me.


I feel like i don't know the "correct" answer and can easily mess this up.

If i say "yes" i say she's chubby. If i say no she feels she is chubby and then feels insecure. But would that technically make her want reassurance so she will eventually get with me?(feels she is fat. so gets with me.)
